name: Density
code: ggplot(gather(as.data.frame({{dataset}}), key = 'Column', value = 'Methylation'), aes(x = Methylation, fill = Column)) + geom_density(alpha = 0.6) + labs(x = 'Methylation', y = 'Density', title = 'Methylation Density Plot')

name: Pearson average row
code: heatmap3({{dataset}}, dendrogram = 'row',Rowv=as.dendrogram(hclust(as.dist(1-cor(t({{dataset}}), method = 'pearson')), method = 'average')),Colv = NA, col = {{palette}}, keysize = 1.0, symkey = FALSE, density.info ='none', trace = 'none',scale='row',labRow=NA, ColSideColors = c(rep('blue', 40), rep('red', 40)), breaks=seq(-1,1,length.out = length({{palette}})+1))

name: Pearson average both
code: heatmap3({{dataset}}, dendrogram = 'both', Rowv=as.dendrogram(hclust(as.dist(1-cor(t({{dataset}}), method = 'pearson')), method = 'average')),Colv = as.dendrogram(hclust(as.dist(1-cor({{dataset}}, method = 'pearson')), method = 'average')), col = {{palette}}, keysize = 1.0,symkey = FALSE, density.info ='none', trace = 'none',scale='row', RowSideColors = rep('blue', nrow({{dataset}})), breaks=seq(-4,4,length.out = (length({{palette}})+1)), margin=margin.plot, sepwidth = 0.1, labCol=NA)

name: Euclidean both breaks2
code: heatmap3({{dataset}}, dendrogram = 'both', col = {{palette}}, symkey = FALSE, density.info ='none', trace = 'none', distfun=(function({{dataset}}) (dist({{dataset}}, method = 'euclidean'))), sepwidth = 0.1, scale='row', labCol=NA)

name: H4
code: heatmap({{dataset}}, scale='row', col={{palette}}, margins=c(5, 5), main='Base R Heatmap')

name: Pheatmap 2
code: pheatmap({{dataset}}, scale='row', color={{palette}}, border_color=NA, main='Custom Color Palette and Annotation Bars', annotation_row=data.frame(Group=factor(rep(c('A', 'B'), each=5))), annotation_col=data.frame(Condition=factor(rep(c('Control', 'Treatment'), each=5))), annotation_colors=list(Group=c('A'='darkgreen', 'B'='darkorange'), Condition=c('Control'='purple', 'Treatment'='cyan')))

name: Pheatmap 3
code: pheatmap({{dataset}}, scale='row', color={{palette}}, border_color=NA, main='Custom Clustering and Dendrogram Colors', clustering_method_rows='ward.D2', clustering_method_cols='ward.D2', dendrogram_colors=c('darkblue', 'darkred'))
